 2016-03842016-05-20NRCAN,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAmending Order AO-006-GC-113-NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd.
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE by the National Energy Board of Amending Order AO-006-GC-113 to NOVA GAS TRANSMISSION LTD in order to reflect the sale of two natural gas pipeline sections totalling 2,17 km, and two meter stations to Keyera Parnership.
